sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import ClickAwayListener from "react-click-away-listener"; import { getAuth, deleteUser } from "firebase/auth"; const Account = ({ setToken, user, setIsLogged }) => { const [modalOpen, setModalOpen] = useState(); const modalToggle = () => { setModalOpen(!modalOpen); }; let history = useHistory(); const deleteAcc = () => { const auth = getAuth(); const currentUser = auth.currentUser; deleteUser(currentUser) .then(() => { setToken(""); setIsLogged(false); history.push("/"); }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); setModalOpen(!modalOpen); }; return ( <>

Confirmation

Are you sure you want to delete this account?

)}
); }; export default Account;
